reviews.customers_say: Customers find the cardigan cute and well-made, with beautiful colors and a flattering fit that works well for different body types. The sweater is soft, lightweight, and comfortable, with one customer noting it's perfect for Georgia weather. While some it runs true to size, others mention it runs big.

items.title: 5.0 out of 5 stars Pretty, Versatile Sweater
items.body: I love the shape and fit of this sweater. It’s a light to medium weight and can be worn in any season; it’s cool enough for warm weather and warm enough for cooler weather. I have worn it with a silk tank underneath (I have one that matches perfectly—a happy accident, but it would work well with other colors, too), open or buttoned almost to the top, and by itself. It makes pulling a nice outfit together easy. I have it in this beautiful color and in black, and will likely get it in other colors, too. It’s well made and looks like it cost much more than it did. Read more
items.author: TP in TX

items.title: 5.0 out of 5 stars Cute, high quality
items.body: This shirt is not only cute, but also very comfortable, and versatile! It goes with so many things! It fits a little oversized, which is exactly what I was looking for! Also very high quality Read more
items.author: Dante

items.title: 4.0 out of 5 stars Lightweight, Stylish, and Easy to Wear
items.body: This half-sleeve cardigan is one of those pieces you end up reaching for all the time. It’s light but still adds just enough warmth, and the fit drapes nicely without feeling boxy. The fabric feels soft, not scratchy, and it layers well over pretty much anything. It works for work, casual days, or just throwing on when you need something simple but put together. If you want a cardigan that’s comfortable, flattering, and easy to style, this one’s a solid pick. Read more
items.author: Jen

items.title: 5.0 out of 5 stars This sweater gets compliments. The fit is perfect. I am 5' tall, 139 lbs wear Medium
items.body: I now have this in 5 colors. I wear a lot of Chico's, and folks just assume this is a Chico's too. Not sure why. The fit, cut, style is so complimentary. I wear the black one with Chico's leopard ankle jeans, or leopard dress pants. The rest with slim jeans. They would be great with flare bottoms too, as the cut is short so that would look fantastic. Size is perfect. Colors are rich, and they are certainly warm enough without being bulky. Read more
items.author: Robin Arquilla

items.title: 5.0 out of 5 stars Beautiful cardigan in person
items.body: Very pretty light blue gray button cardigan. More light blue than gray. Couldn’t get the wrinkles out, so I washed it and then forgot it was in the dryer: it clearly shrank. But I had another load in the washer on the rinse cycle so I threw it back in and then didn’t dry it. Regained its original shape with a little stretching. It’s not super thick material but I’m always hot so that’s ok. It’s way cuter in person than in the ads. I’m 5’2, 129 lbs and bought a medium. Plenty of room. It’s a boxy fit, hits the top of my hip. Soft material. Read more
items.author: Laura P

items.title: 1.0 out of 5 stars Button Up Grey Sweater Shirt
items.body: Don't recommend, super cheap looking and feeling! Read more
items.author: Cute, but broke the second i opened the box.

items.title: 3.0 out of 5 stars Nice sweater
items.body: Nice sweater but they sent the wrong color that's why they are getting 3 stars because now I gotta order the Black one they sent the olive green and I like so much I'm keeping it nice crop sweater Read more
items.author: Customer

items.title: 5.0 out of 5 stars Quality sweater
items.body: I have been enjoying this sweater as a transitional piece into fall. The weight of the fabric is perfect for Georgia weather. I bought the light blue and the olive green in size large. Beautiful colors and has the oversized fit. I bought a larger size than needed because I’m a 34H and I like to wash and dry my clothes. It washes up great and still looks new! Read more
items.author: VAZ1

short_description:
Womens Dress is made for a polished look that still feels comfortable to wear. It is designed to sit cleanly on the body with a flattering shape that works for day plans and dressier moments without feeling overdone.

The fit focuses on balance rather than extremes, so you can move naturally while still getting a defined silhouette. Choose your usual size for a closer look, or size up if you prefer a little more ease through the waist and hips.

Styling is simple: keep accessories minimal for a clean finish, or add a jacket and statement shoes when you want a sharper outfit. This piece photographs well thanks to smooth lines and a structured feel that stays put once you have it adjusted.

With the right fit and simple styling, this item becomes an easy go-to when you want something that looks intentional without requiring extra effort.

The design is easy to style with simple accessories and works well in photos thanks to clean lines and a balanced silhouette.

The design is easy to style with simple accessories and works well in photos thanks to clean lines and a balanced silhouette.
about_this_item:

The fit focuses on balance rather than extremes, so you can move naturally while still getting a defined silhouette. Choose your usual size for a closer look, or size up if you prefer a little more ease through the waist and hips.

Styling is simple: keep accessories minimal for a clean finish, or add a jacket and statement shoes when you want a sharper outfit. This piece photographs well thanks to smooth lines and a structured feel that stays put once you have it adjusted.

long_description:
Womens Dress is a versatile piece you can reach for when you want a put-together look that still feels comfortable. The goal is simple: a silhouette that reads polished, photographs well, and stays wearable for a full day or a long night.

Fit and sizing Fit is where most outfits win or lose. This design aims for a balanced shape with a defined line through the torso, a clean waist, and a smooth finish through the hips and legs. If you prefer a more relaxed feel, size up; if you like a closer fit, stay true to size. Sizes may include: XS, S, M, L, XL.

Fabric and comfort Comfort is not just about softness. It is also about movement and how the fabric behaves as you walk, sit, and stand. A fabric blend with a bit of give helps it keep its shape while still feeling wearable.

Highlights A clean neckline and a refined silhouette for an elevated look. Designed to layer easily with jackets, wraps, or sweaters. Works well with both minimal accessories and statement pieces.

How to style Styling ideas: keep it minimal with neutral shoes and one standout accessory. For a relaxed daytime look, add a denim jacket or cardigan. For events, switch to a bolder shoe and a small clutch for a sharper finish.

Color notes Available colors may include: Sky Blue, Pink1, Red1, Dark Grey, Grey Blue, White1, Army Green, Black, Coffee, Navy Blue, Black1, Orange, Rose Red, Wine Red. If a shade is sold out, check back as availability can change.

Care Care guidance matters if you want it to keep its shape and finish. Follow the label first.
